# Build results
bin/
obj/
out/

# User-specific files
*.user
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# MonoDevelop
*.userprefs

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Visual Studio Code
.vscode/

# Rider
.idea/

# Logs
*.log

# NuGet
*.nupkg
packages/
*.snupkg

# DotCover
*.dotCover

# Test results
TestResults/
*.trx
*.coverage
*.coveragexml

# Build artifacts
*.dll
*.exe
*.app
*.pdb

# Azure Pipelines
.vs/

# Backup files
*~ 
*.bak

# Local database
*.mdf
*.ldf

# Publish output
publish/
wwwroot/

# Secrets (si tu as un fichier avec des secrets)
secrets.json
appsettings.Development.json
